summary: Gianni Versace  was an Italian fashion designer and founder of Versace S.p.A., an international fashion house.
full_text: Andrew Phillip Cunanan  was an American serial killer who murdered at least five people, including fashion designer Gianni Versace, during a three-month period in 1997. On June 12, 1997, Cunanan became the 449th fugitive to be listed by the FBI on the FBI Ten Most Wanted Fugitives list. The killing spree ended with Cunanan's suicide. He was 27 years old.
title: Andrew Cunanan
